comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A Willard D McKinstry was editor of the Watertown (NY) Times from about 1886 until he died in 1919. See www.watertowndailytimes.com/article/20110922/NEWS/709229849/

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A 1936 retrospective on the Watertown Daily Times (reprinted in 1976) described McKinstry as clean-shaven, of serious mien, and weighing over 200 pounds. That is compatible with this photo. See fultonhistory.com/Newspapers%20Disk3/Watertown%20Times/Wa...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: An obituary in the Oswego Times -- fultonhistory.com/Process%20Small/Newspapers/Oswego%20Tim... indicates that in 1915, he was appointed to a three year term on the New York State Civil Service Commission.
